subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks were an unmitigated mess.  Then they were brilliant.  If only the two were reversed, the home crowd’s anger, frustration and ultimate disappointment might have been eased.
snippet: The Knicks were an unmitigated mess.  Then they were brilliant.  If only the two were reversed, the home crowd’s anger, frustration and ultimate disappointment might have been eased.
